name: WH40k-Titans
title: WH40k: Titans
author: AivanF
description:
TechPriest, are you seeking Omnissiah blessing to protect and expand your Forge World?.. Legio Titanicus is here for you!

The mod provides unique and customizable war machines from WarHammer 40.000 with enormously powerful military capabilities. Production challenges included! In case of you are tired of logistics, you can also explore and restore broken titans, performing real Adeptus Mechanicus expeditions!

Compatible with most of overhaul mods.
WIP WARNING! The mod is in active development, backward compatibility is maintained, but recipes may be altered. Join my Discord server to stay in touch!
